title: Baxian Yu Tiaozao
synopsis: The film tells that when the Eight Immortals crossed the East China Sea, the Dragon King tried to stop. The Eight Immortals beat the Dragon King. The Dragon King turned into a dragon boat and sent the Eight Immortals across the sea to Penglai. After landing, when the Eight Immortals were resting in a hotel, a flea jumped out, disturbing the Eight Immortals. The immortals were furious and took out all kinds of magic weapons to kill the flea, but the fleas were still safe and sound. Just as the Eight Immortals looked at the flea helplessly, the noise disturbed the shop waiter. I saw the shop waiter holding the flea in her palm and squeezing it gently to subdue the flea. After seeing the Eight Immortals, they couldn't help being surprised...(source:wikipedia)
